   <script type="text/javascript">
    var PREBID_TIMEOUT = 950;
 function initAdserver() {
       if (pbjs.initAdserverSet) return;
       //load GPT library here
       loadScript('https://www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js');
       pbjs.initAdserverSet = true;
     };
     // Load GPT when timeout is reached if bidders haven't responded.
     setTimeout(initAdserver, PREBID_TIMEOUT);
     var pbjs = pbjs || {};
     pbjs.que = pbjs.que || [];
     // Load the Prebid Javascript Library Async. We recommend loading it immediately after
     // the initAdserver() and setTimeout functions.
     loadScript('https://'+BMyOTS.domain +'/js/prebid_20170202.js');
     /**
      * Loads the given script async
     */
     function loadScript(scriptSrc) {
       var script = document.createElement('script');
       script.async=true;
       script.type = 'text/javascript';
       var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
       script.src = scriptSrc;
       var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
       node.parentNode.insertBefore(script, node);
     }
     pbjs.que.push(function() {
       /* 1. Register bidder tag Ids
         Registers the bidder tags for your ad units. Once the prebid.js
         library loads, it reads the pbjs.adUnits object and sends out
         bid requests. Find the complete reference on bidders at
         http://prebid.org/bidders.html.
         code:  Your GPT slot’s ad unit path. If they don’t match, prebid.js
              would not be able to set targeting correctly
         sizes: All sizes your ad unit accepts. They should match with GPT.
       */
       var adUnits = [{
         code: 'adpos_Right1',
         sizes: [
           [300, 250]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222622","sizes":[15]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10093361"}},
 ,
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430659"}},
         ]
       },{
         code: 'adpos_Right2',
         sizes: [
           [300, 250]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222624","sizes":[15]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10105230"}},
 ,
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430661"}},
         ]
       },{
         code: 'adpos_Right3',
         sizes: [
           [300, 250]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222624","sizes":[15]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10105230"}},
 ,
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430662"}},
         ]
       },{
         code: 'adpos_Top',
         sizes: [
           [1600, 1000], [970, 66], [970, 250], [800, 250], [980, 240], [980, 150], [728, 90], [320, 50]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222622","sizes":[2]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10093361"}},
 ,
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430654"}},
         ]
       },{
         code: 'adpos_Bottom',
         sizes: [
           [970, 66], [980, 150], [728, 90], [320, 50]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222624","sizes":[2]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10105230"}},
 ,
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430656"}}
         ]
       },{
         code: 'adpos_Skyscraper',
         sizes: [
           [160, 600], [240, 600], [300, 600]
         ],
         bids: [
           // 1 ad unit can be targeted by multiple bids.
 {"bidder":"rubicon","params":{"accountId":"12464","siteId":"49136","zoneId":"222622","sizes":[10]}},
 {"bidder":"appnexus","params":{"placementId":"10105230"}},
 {"bidder":"sovrn","params":{"tagid":"430664"}},
         ]
       }];
       //add the adUnits
       pbjs.addAdUnits(adUnits);
       /* Request bids for the added ad units. If adUnits or adUnitCodes are
          not specified, the function will request bids for all added ad units.
       */
       pbjs.requestBids({
         /* The bidsBack function will be called when either timeout is
            reached, or when all bids come back, whichever happens sooner.
         */
         bidsBackHandler: function(bidResponses) {
           initAdserver();
         },
         timeout : PREBID_TIMEOUT
         /* You can specify specific `adUnitCodes` to only request bids
            for certain ad units.
            adUnitCodes: ['code1', 'code2']
         */
         /* You can also make one off bid requests for the given `adUnits`.
            adUnits: [adUnit2, adUnit1]
         */
         /* The bidsBackHandler will be executed either when all bids are
            back, or when the timeout is reached.
            timeout: 1000
         */
       });
       /* 2. Configure Ad Server Targeting
          The below section defines what key value targeting will be sent to GPT.
          For each bidder’s bid, Prebid.js will set the below 4 keys (hb_bidder,
          hb_adid, hb_pb, hb_size) with their corresponding values.
          Bidders all have different recommended ad server line item targeting and
          creative setup. To remove the headache for you, Prebid.js has a default
          recommended query string targeting setting for all bidders.
          If you’d like to customize the key value pairs, you can overwrite the settings
          as the below example shows. Let your ad ops team know about the change, so they
          can update the line item targeting accordingly.
       */
       pbjs.bidderSettings = {
         //standard applies to all bidders
         standard: {
           adserverTargeting: [{
             key: "hb_bidder",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.bidderCode;
             }
           }, {
             key: "hb_adid",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.adId;
             }
           }, {
             key: "hb_pb",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.pbMg;
             }
           }]
         },
         //You can call out a specific bidder to adjust them only as well. 
         appnexus: {
           bidCpmAdjustment: function(bidCpm) { //adjust the CPM dynamically
             return bidCpm * 1.12;
           },
           alwaysUseBid: true,
           adserverTargeting: [{
             key: "hb_bidder",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.bidderCode;
             }
           }, {
             key: "hb_adid",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.adId;
             }
           }, {
             key: "hb_pb",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.pbMg;
             }
           }, {
             key: "hb_size",
             val: function(bidResponse) {
               return bidResponse.getSize();
             }
           }]
         }
       };
     });  //end push command
   </script>
   <script>
    var prebidPushFunc = function(){
       pbjs.que.push(function() {
         /* Set query string targeting on all GPT ad units. The logic for deciding query strings is described
         in the section Configure AdServer Targeting. Note that this function has to be called after all ad units on page are defined. */
         pbjs.setTargetingForGPTAsync();
     });
   }
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    <!-- endblock -->
   var dfp_keywords={"lang":"de","locale":"de_CH","m":"n","t":"other home"};
   var dfp_sitePage='/7730/SI_DECH';
   var slots = [];
   googletag.cmd.push(function() {
 
     // when the resolution is high enough show a wallpaper
     if(screen.width > 1200) {
       var wallpaperison = "yes";
     }
     else{
       var wallpaperison = "no";
     }
 
     var leaderboardMapping = googletag.sizeMapping().
       addSize([1024, 200], [[1600, 1000], [970, 66], [970, 250], [800, 250], [980, 240], [980, 150], [728, 90], [2, 1]]). // Desktop
       addSize([768, 200], [728, 90]). // Tablet
       addSize([0, 0], [320, 50]). // Mobile
       build();
 
     var leaderboardMappingBottom = googletag.sizeMapping().
       addSize([1024, 200], [[970, 66], [980, 150], [728, 90], [2, 2]]). // Desktop
       addSize([768, 200], [728, 90]). // Tablet
       addSize([0, 0], [320, 50]). // Mobile
       build();
 
     var skyscraperMapping =  googletag.sizeMapping().
       addSize([0, 0], []).
       addSize([1200, 500], [[160, 600], [240, 600], [300, 600], [4, 1]]).
       build();
 
     slots.push( googletag.defineSlot(dfp_sitePage, [320, 50], 'adpos_Top')
       .defineSizeMapping(leaderboardMapping)
       .addService(googletag.pubads())
         .setTargeting("p",["Top"])
           .setTargeting("wpon",wallpaperison) );
 
     slots.push( googletag.defineSlot(dfp_sitePage, [160, 600], 'adpos_Skyscraper')
       .defineSizeMapping(skyscraperMapping)
       .addService(googletag.pubads())
         .setTargeting("p",["Sky"]) 
         .setCollapseEmptyDiv(false)
         );
 
     slots.push( googletag.defineSlot(dfp_sitePage, [320, 50], 'adpos_Bottom')
       .defineSizeMapping(leaderboardMappingBottom)
       .addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("p",["Bottom"]) );
 
     slots.push( googletag.defineSlot(dfp_sitePage, [7, 1], 'adpos_Onscroll')
       .addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("p",["Onscroll"]) );
 
     var nativeMapping = googletag.sizeMapping().
       addSize([1024, 200], [600, 160]). // Desktop
       addSize([680, 200], [300, 180]). // Tablet
       addSize([0, 0], [300, 180]). // Mobile
       build();
 
     slots.push( googletag.defineSlot(dfp_sitePage, [300, 180], 'adpos_NativeSlot1')
       .defineSizeMapping(nativeMapping)
       .addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("p",["NativeSlot1"]) );
 
     var adsConfig = [{"pos":"Right1","sizes":[[300,250],[3,1]]},{"pos":"Right2","sizes":[[300,250],[3,2]]},{"pos":"Right3","sizes":[[300,250],[3,3]]}];
     var sitePage  = dfp_sitePage;
     for(var i = 0;i < adsConfig.length; i++ ) {
       var adConfig = adsConfig[i];
       slots.push( googletag.defineSlot( dfp_sitePage, adConfig.sizes, 'adpos_' + adConfig.pos)
         .addService(googletag.pubads())
         .setTargeting("p",[adConfig.pos]) );
     }
 
    if(typeof BMyOTS.latitude == 'number' && typeof BMyOTS.longitude == 'number'){
     googletag.pubads().setLocation(BMyOTS.latitude, BMyOTS.longitude);
    }
 
     Object.keys(dfp_keywords).forEach(function(key){
       googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, dfp_keywords[key]);
     })
 
     var dfpWidth = window.innerWidth;
     var dfpHeight = window.innerHeight;
 
     if (dfpWidth) {
 	dfpWidth = dfpWidth.toString();
     }
 
     if (dfpHeight) {
 	dfpHeight = dfpHeight.toString();
     }
 
     googletag.pubads().setTargeting("resWidth", dfpWidth );
     googletag.pubads().setTargeting("resHeight", dfpHeight );
 
     prebidPushFunc();
 
     googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
     googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs(true);
     googletag.pubads().enableAsyncRendering();
     googletag.enableServices();
 
     OTS.dfp._slots = slots;
   });
 
   OTS.dfp.init({
     listpos: '[{"pos":"Right1","sizes":[[300,250],[3,1]]},{"pos":"Right2","sizes":[[300,250],[3,2]]},{"pos":"Right3","sizes":[[300,250],[3,3]]}]'
   });
 
   var forceRefreashAdPos = function(adPos) {
       for( var i = 0; i < slots.length; i++) {
           if( slots[i].getSlotElementId() == adPos ) {
               googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                   googletag.pubads().refresh([slots[i]]);
               });
               break;
           }
       }
   };
   </script>

     ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'stats.g.doubleclick.net/dc.js';

 function recordOutboundLink(link, category, action, label) {
     try {
       _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
       _gaq.push(['globalTracker._trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
     }catch(err){
       console.log(err);
     }
   }
 
 function recordOutboundLinkTarget(link, category, action, label, target) {
     try {
       _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
       _gaq.push(['globalTracker._trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
     }catch(err){
       console.log(err);
     }
     if ( target == "blank") { window.open(link,'_blank'); } else { setTimeout('window.location = "' + link + '"', 100) }
     return true;
   }
 
   function recordEvent(category, action, label) {
     try {
       _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
       _gaq.push(['globalTracker._trackEvent', category , action, label ]);
     }catch(err){
       console.log(err);
     }
   }
 
   function recordEventValue(category, action, label, value, nonInteract) {
       try {
         _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', category , action, label, value, nonInteract ]);
         _gaq.push(['globalTracker._trackEvent', category , action, label, value, nonInteract ]);
       }catch(err){}
   }

   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
         var c = OTS.getCookie('acceptCookies');
         if (!c || c == '') {
             $('#cookiePolicy').slideDown(500);
         }
     });
     
     function acceptCookies() {
         $("#cookiePolicy").fadeOut(500);
         OTS.setCookie('acceptCookies', '1',720);
     }
   </script>
   <style type="text/css">
    #cookiePolicy {
   display: none;
   position: fixed;
   top: 0;
   left: 0;
   z-index: 35200;
   background: #000;
   width: 100%;
   min-height: 40px;
   border-bottom: 1px solid #CCC;
   box-shadow: 0 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.48);
 }
 
 .cookiePolicy-content {
   padding: 0 8px;
   width: 964px;
   margin-left: auto;
   margin-right: auto;
   position: relative;
 }
 
 .cookiePolicy-close {
   float: left;
 }
 
 .cookiePolicy-close a {
   color: #fff;
 }
 
 .cookiePolicy-close .text {
   margin: 10px 10px 0 16px;
   color: #FFFFFF;
   float: left;
   font-weight: bold;
   max-width: 900px;
 }
 .cookiePolicy-close .text a { text-decoration: underline; }
 
 .cookiePolicy-close .btn_default    {
   float: left;
   margin-top: 7px;
 }
 
 @media screen and (max-width: 680px) {
 	.cookiePolicy-content {
 	    padding-bottom: 8px !important;
 	    width: 100% !important;
 	}
 }
   </style>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
 
         var c = OTS.getCookie('localSiteDialog');
         if (!c || c == '') {
             var lang = BMyOTS.country_code.toUpperCase();
             var portalCountry = BMyOTS.portal_country.toUpperCase();
             var browserlang = (navigator.language || navigator.systemLanguage || navigator.userLanguage ).substr(0, 2).toUpperCase();
             var browserlang2 = (navigator.language || navigator.systemLanguage || navigator.userLanguage ).substr(3, 2).toUpperCase();
             if ( !lang ) { lang = browserlang2; }
             if ( !lang ) { lang = browserlang; }
             if ( lang != portalCountry && lang != '' ) {
                 if (
                     ( portalCountry == 'BE' && ( lang != 'NL' && lang != 'FR' ) ) ||
                     ( portalCountry == 'CA' && ( lang != 'EN' && lang != 'FR' ) ) ||
                     ( portalCountry == 'CH' && ( lang != 'DE' && lang != 'FR' && lang != 'IT' ) ) ||
                     ( portalCountry == 'GB' && ( lang != 'EN' ) ) ||
                     ( portalCountry == 'US' && ( lang != 'EN' ) ) ||
                     ( portalCountry != 'BE' && portalCountry != 'CA' && portalCountry != 'CH' && portalCountry != 'GB' && portalCountry != 'US' )
                 ) {
                     if ( lang == 'BE' || lang == 'CA' || lang == 'CH' ) {
                         lang = lang+browserlang;
                     }
 /*
                     $.post("/ajax/portalSelector", { "lang": lang },
                         function(data){
                             $("body").append(data);
                             $('#localSiteDialog').slideDown(500);
                             setTimeout(function() {
                                 $("#localSiteDialog").hide('fade', {}, 500)
                             }, 60000);
                          });
 */
                 }
             }
         }
     });
 
     function stopBuggingMe() {
         $("#localSiteDialog").fadeOut(500);
         OTS.setCookie('localSiteDialog', '1',720);
     }
   </script>
   <style type="text/css">
    #localSiteDialog {
   display: none;
   position: fixed;
   top: 0;
   left: 0;
   z-index: 35100;
   background: rgb(0,121,194);
   background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,121,194,1) 0%, rgba(0,175,232,1) 15%, rgba(0,175,232,1) 100%);
   background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(0,121,194,1)), color-stop(15%,rgba(0,175,232,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(0,175,232,1)));
   background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,121,194,1) 0%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 15%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 100%);
   background: -o-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,121,194,1) 0%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 15%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 100%);
   background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,121,194,1) 0%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 15%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 100%);
   background: linear-gradient(to bottom,  rgba(0,121,194,1) 0%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 15%,rgba(0,175,232,1) 100%);
   filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#0079c2', endColorstr='#00afe8',GradientType=0 );
   width: 100%;
   height: 35px;
   border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(129,224,255,1);
   box-shadow: 0 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.48);
 }

   padding: 0 8px;
   width: 964px;
   margin-left: auto;

 }

 }

   display: inline-block;
   vertical-align: -10%;

 }
 
 .local-site-close {
   float: right;
 }
 
 .local-site-close a {
   color: #fff;
 }

   margin: 10px 10px 0 0;
   float: right;
 }

   float: right;
   margin: 8px 12px 0 0;
   border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.5);
   color: #FFFFFF;
   font: 1.8em/15px Arial,sans-serif;
   height: 16px;
   padding: 1px;
   text-align: center;
   width: 16px;
   background: #00afe8;
   box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(129,224,255,1);
 }

          <script language="javascript">
           $(document).ready(function() {
     $('#heroSlider').royalSlider({
         controlNavigation: 'thumbnails',
         autoScaleSlider: true,
         autoScaleSliderWidth: 616,
         autoScaleSliderHeight: 492,
         loop: true,
         imageScaleMode: 'fit-if-smaller',
         navigateByClick: true,
         numImagesToPreload:2,
         arrowsNav:true,
         arrowsNavAutoHide: false,
         arrowsNavHideOnTouch: false,
         keyboardNavEnabled: true,
         fadeinLoadedSlide: true,
         globalCaption: true,
         globalCaptionInside: false,
         thumbs: {
           appendSpan: true,
           firstMargin: true,
           spacing: 7
         },
 	    autoPlay: {
 	        enabled: true,
 	        pauseOnHover: true,
 	        delay: 4000
 	    }
     });
     var slider = $("#heroSlider").data('royalSlider');
     slider.ev.on('rsBeforeMove', function(event, type, userAction) {
       if(userAction){
        try{
         OTS.Krux.trackOtherWidget('hero_space','scroller');
         }catch(e){};
       }
     });
     slider.ev.on('rsSlideClick', function(event, originalEvent) {
       if( originalEvent.target.nodeName == 'IMG'){
         try{
           OTS.Krux.trackOtherWidget('hero_space','scroller');
         }catch(e){};
       }else if(originalEvent.target.nodeName == 'A'){
         try{
           OTS.Krux.trackOtherWidget('hero_space','reader');
         }catch(e){};
       }
     });
     setTimeout(function(){ slider.updateSliderSize(true); }, 3000);
 });
          </script>

              <script type="text/javascript">
               //Search suggest with nice arrow key/enter behavior
 
     if (typeof  subPA == 'undefined') {
             var  subPA = {};
     }
 
     subPA.Search = {
         _delay: 1, // delay in seconds
         _delayMultiplier: 1,
         _url: '/ajax/simpleResortSearch',
         q: [],
         _pause: false,
         _length: 0,
         _prevLength: 0,
         resorts : [],
         
         _customKeyCodes: { 
             40: 'downArrow',
             38: 'upArrow',
             13: 'enter'
         },
         
         _searchBox: '#subPAsearch',
         _resultsDiv: '#subPAresults',
         
         init: function(){
             $(subPA.Search._searchBox).keyup(function(e) {
                 subPA.Search._prevLength = subPA.Search._length;
                 subPA.Search._length = $(e.target).val().replace(/ +(?= )/g,'').length;
                 
                 if( e.keyCode == 8 || subPA.Search._prevLength == subPA.Search._length || subPA.Search._prevLength - subPA.Search._length >= 1 ) {
                     subPA.Search._pause = false;
                     subPA.Search._delayMultiplier = 1.25;
                 }
                 subPA.Search.addToQueue( function() { subPA.Search.query( e ); } );
             });
 
             $('#subPAresults li,#snowreport_search li,#search_page_results li').on('mouseover', function(){
                 $(this).addClass('highlight');
             })
             .on('mouseout', function(){
                 $(this).removeClass('highlight');
             });
         },
         
         addToQueue: function( func ) {
             subPA.Search.q = []; // First reset queue to save server calls
             subPA.Search.q.push( func ); // Add to the queue;
             
             if( !subPA.Search._pause ) {
                 setTimeout( 'subPA.Search.processQueue()', subPA.Search._delay*1000*subPA.Search._delayMultiplier );
             }
             
             
         },
         
         processQueue: function() {
             if( subPA.Search.q.length == 0 ) {
                 return false;
             } else {
                 subPA.Search.q.shift()();
             }
         },
         
         query: function( e ) {
             
             var term = $(e.target).val().replace(/ +(?= )/g,'');
             
             //${data.id_name}.Search._searchBox = '#' + $( e.target ).attr('id');
             //${data.id_name}.Search._resultsDiv = '#${data.id_name}results';
             if(subPA.Search._customKeyCodes[e.keyCode]){
                 return subPA.Search[subPA.Search._customKeyCodes[e.keyCode]](e);
             }
             
             if(term.length < 3){
                 subPA.Search._pause = false;
                 return false;
             }
             $.post(subPA.Search._url, {search: term, jsClass: 'subPA'}, function(data){ 
                     if( data=='' ) {
                         subPA.Search._pause = true;
                     }
                     
                     subPA.Search.callback(data);
                     subPA.Search._delayMultiplier = 1;
                 }
             );
             
         },
         
         callback: function(data){
             $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv).html(data);
             $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv).show();
             $('body').bind('click', function(){
                 $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv).hide();
                 $('body').unbind('click');
                 if($(subPA.Search._searchBox).val() === ''){
                     $(subPA.Search._searchBox).val(OTS.Strings.Search.nameFinder);
                 }
             });
         },
         
         //todo: scroll div with keyboard as well?
         downArrow: function(e){
             var $active = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li.highlight');
             if(!$active){ 
                 $active = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li:first'); 
             }
            
             var $next = ($active.next().length === 0 
                 ? $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li:first') 
                 : $active.next());
              
             $active.removeClass('highlight');
             $next.addClass('highlight');
             
             return false;
         },
         
         upArrow: function(e){
             var $active = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li.highlight');
             if(!$active){ 
                 $active = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv +  'li:last'); 
             }
            
             var $prev = ($active.prev().length == 0 
                 ? $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li:last') 
                 : $active.prev());
                
             $active.removeClass('highlight');
             $prev.addClass('highlight');
             return false;
             
         },
         
         enter: function(e){
             //off to highlighted item
             if($(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li.highlight').length){
                 window.location = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li.highlight a').attr('href');
                 return false;
             }
             //submit form for full search results page
             else {
                if ($(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li a').length == 1) {
                    window.location = $(subPA.Search._resultsDiv + ' li a').attr('href');
                    return false;
                } else {
                    //validateGlobalSearch();
                    return true;
                }
             }
         },
         
         addResort: function(id, resortname) {
             if ($.inArray(id, subPA.Search.resorts) < 0) {
                 $('#subPAForm input[name=resort_id]').val(id);
                 $('#subPAForm input#subPAsearch').val(resortname);
                 resortId = id;
             }
         },
         
     };
              </script>
              <div class="for_e">
               Deine E-Mail-Adresse
               <span class="for_email">
                *
               </span>
               <div class="clear">
               </div>
               <input name="resort_id" type="hidden" value="0"/>
               <input class="txt_inp" name="sub_e" title="Gib hier bitte deine E-Mail Adresse ein" type="text" value=""/>
               <input class="light_green_btn btn_submit" type="submit" value="Anmelden"/>
               <div class="clear">
               </div>
               <div class="checkbox">
                <input checked="checked" name="sub_nl" type="checkbox" value="1"/>
                <label class="checked" for="sub_nl">
                 Skiinfo Newsletter und Angebots-Newsletter
                </label>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="clear">
              </div>
              <span class="for_terms">
               Wenn ihr einen Mailservice abonniert, stimmt ihr unseren
               <a href="/terms" target="_blank">
                Nutzungsbedingungen
               </a>
               zu. Mit jeder Mail habt ihr die Möglichkeit, euch wieder abzumelden. Alle Skiinfo-Angebote sind und bleiben kostenfrei.
              </span>
             </form>
             <script>
              $( "#subPAForm" ).submit(function( event ) {
     event.preventDefault();
     $( "#SUsubPA > span.error").remove();
     $( "#SUsubPA > span.receipt").remove();
     var dP = {
       sub_pa:1,
       sub_sf:1,
       sub_sr:1,
       sub_nl:0,
       subby: "undefined rail widget",
       slot: undefined
     };
 
     var printError = function(string){
         $( "#SUsubPA").prepend( '<span class="receipt error">' + string + '<br /></span>');
     }
 
     var printSuccess = function(string){
       //${out.global.req.translatorMethod('thanks_for_subscribe')}
       $( "#SUsubPA").prepend( '<span class="receipt">' + string + '</span>');
     }
 
     var formValidation = {
       sub_e : {
         validate: function(emailString){
           var emailregExp = /^((([a-z]|\d|[!#\$%&'\*\+\-\/=\?\^_`{\|}~]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])+(\.([a-z]|\d|[!#\$%&'\*\+\-\/=\?\^_`{\|}~]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])+)*)|((\x22)((((\x20|\x09)*(\x0d\x0a))?(\x20|\x09)+)?(([\x01-\x08\x0b\x0c\x0e-\x1f\x7f]|\x21|[\x23-\x5b]|[\x5d-\x7e]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(\\([\x01-\x09\x0b\x0c\x0d-\x7f]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF]))))*(((\x20|\x09)*(\x0d\x0a))?(\x20|\x09)+)?(\x22)))@((([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|\d|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])))\.)+(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])|(([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])([a-z]|\d|-|\.|_|~|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF])*([a-z]|[\u00A0-\uD7FF\uF900-\uFDCF\uFDF0-\uFFEF]))){2,6}$/i;
 
           if(!emailString || !emailregExp.test(emailString)){
             return false;
           }else{
             return true;
           }
         },
         error: "Ungültige E-Mail-Adresse",
       },
       resort_id: {
         validate: function(idInt){
           var _id = parseInt(idInt);
           if(_id && _id != 0){
             return true;
           }
           return false;
         },
         error: "Kein Skigebiet ausgewählt",
       }
     };
 
     var btof = { email: 'sub_e', resortId: 'resort_id'};
 
     var $form = $( this );
     var resortId = $form.find("input[name='resort_id']").val();
     var email = $form.find("input[name='sub_e']").val();
     var formError = false;
     if(!formValidation.sub_e.validate(email)){
       formError = true;
       printError(formValidation.sub_e.error);
     }
     if(!formValidation.resort_id.validate(resortId)){
       printError(formValidation.resort_id.error);
       formError = true;
     }
 
     if(formError){
 
     }else{
      var term = $form.find("input[name='sub_nl']" );
       if(term.is(':checked')){
          dP.sub_nl = 1;
       }
       dP.resortId = resortId;
       dP.sub_e = email;
 
       var lru = '' + '/aj' + 'ax/' + resortId + '/subscr'+'ibe/subpa';
 
       var posting = $.post( lru, dP );
 
       posting.done(function( data ) {
         if(data.code == 'failed'){
           //need to make better errors.
           data.missing_fields.forEach(function(v){
             if(btop.hasOwnProperty(v)){
               printError(formValidation[btop[v]].error);
             }else{
               printError(v);
             }
           });
         }else if(data.code =='success'){
           printSuccess(data.message || 'Success');
           recordOutboundLink(this, 'Resort Subscribe', 'Subscribe undefined rail subPA', 'Resort Subscribe|Subscribe undefined rail subPA|'+resortId);
           fbq('track', 'CompleteRegistration');
           return false;
         }
       });
     }
 });
             </script>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

          <form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/skigebiete-finden.html" class="command_bar_form" id="resort_finder_form" method="get">
           <input name="et_ignore" type="hidden" value="1"/>
           <div class="col_8 home_section resort_finder_drilldown">
            <div class="border_box box_header module">
             <div class="border_box_header wIcon">
              <h3 title="Finde Dein Skigebiet">
               Finde Dein Skigebiet
              </h3>
              <div class="hdr_icon resort_finder_ico">
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="resort_finder_drilldown_input_button resBox">
              <div class="resort_finder_sub_header">
               Wir sagen euch, welches Skigebiet zu euch passt. Bitte wählt zunächst ein Land oder mehrere Länder im Dropdown aus!
              </div>
              <div class="resort_finder_drilldown_input ">
               <input autocomplete="off" id="locations_text" name="regions" onclick="$('#resort_finder_regions').toggle();" readonly="readonly" type="text" value="Land/Region wählen"/>
              </div>
              <div class="resort_finder_drilldown_button ">
               <input class="light_blue_btn btn_default" id="pa_suBtn" type="submit" value="Ergebnisse"/>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="clear">
             </div>
             <script>
             </script>
             <ul class="topRegions resBox" id="resort_finder_regions" style="display:none; top:115px;">
              <li class="resort_finder_region">
               <div class="resort_finder_region_header">
                <div class="checkbox">
                 <input class="Vereinigte Staaten" name="regions" type="checkbox" value="429"/>

                  <span class="flag_sprite id429" style="display: inline-block; margin-right: 5px;">
                  </span>

                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
               <ul class="resort_finder_region_subs">

                  <input class="Alaska" name="regions" type="checkbox" value="219"/>

          <script>
           function updateTextArea() {         
          var size = 6;
          var allVals = [];
          $('.checkbox :checked').each(function() {
            allVals.push($(this).attr("class"));
          });
 
          if (allVals.length > size ) {
              $('#locations_text').val(allVals.length + " undefined");
          } else {
             $('#locations_text').val(allVals);
          }
       }
      $(function() {
        $('.checkbox input').click(updateTextArea);
        updateTextArea();
      });
          </script>
          <script>
           $('ul.topRegions > li :checkbox').on('click', function () {
 
         var $chk = $(this),
             $li = $chk.closest('li'),
             $ul, $parent;
         if ($li.has('ul')) {
             $li.find(':checkbox').not(this).prop('checked', this.checked)
         }
         do {
             $ul = $li.parent();
             $parent = $ul.siblings(':checkbox');
             if ($chk.is(':checked')) {
                 $parent.prop('checked', $ul.has(':checkbox:not(:checked)').length == 0)
             } else {
                 $parent.prop('checked', false)
             }
             $chk = $parent;
             $li = $chk.closest('li');
         } while ($ul.is(':not(.someClass)'));
     });
          </script>

          <script language="javascript">
           $(document).ready(function() {
   $('#ots_gallery.gallery_list .bucket a').click(function() {
     if ( $(this).hasClass('touchHover') ) {
       return false;
     }
   });
   $('#ots_gallery.gallery_list .bucket a').on('touchstart', function(e){
     if ( !$(this).hasClass('touchHover') ) {
       $('#ots_gallery.gallery_list .bucket a').removeClass('touchHover');
       $(this).addClass('touchHover');
     } else {
       $('#ots_gallery.gallery_list .bucket a').removeClass('touchHover');
     }
   });
 });
          </script>

          <script type="text/javascript">
           $(document).ready(function(){
   $("form#nl_form").validate({
     invalidHandler: function(form, validator) {
       var errors = validator.numberOfInvalids();
       if (errors) {
           var message = errors == 1
           ?  "Du hast ein Feld vergessen. Es ist hervorgehoben."
             : 'You missed ' + errors + ' fields. They have been highlighted';
           $("div.error span").html(message);
           $("div.error").show();
       } else {
           $("div.error").hide();
             }
       },
     rules: {
       'email' : {
           required: true,
           email: true
       }
     },
     messages: {
       'email' : {
           required: "Bitte Email-Adresse eingeben",
           email: "Die E-Mail Adresse ist nicht korrekt"
       }
     },
     submitHandler: function() {
       $('#sub_newsletter').css('cursor','wait');
       $('#sub_newsletter #nl_form').slideUp(500);
 
       var formData = $('form#nl_form').serialize();
       $.ajax({
           type: "POST",
           url: "/ajax/nlsubscribe",
           dataType: 'html',
           data: formData,
           json: true,
           success: function(vs) {
             console.log(vs);
             var n=vs.indexOf('"error"');
             if (n > 0) {
               $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').addClass('error_msg');
               $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').html(vs.message);
               $('#sub_newsletter #nl_form').slideDown(500);
             } else {
               $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').addClass('success_msg');
               $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').html(vs.message);
               fbq('track', 'CompleteRegistration');
             }
             $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').show();
             $('#sub_newsletter').css('cursor','auto');
           },
           error: function(jqXHR, textStatus) {
             $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').addClass('error_msg');
             $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').html("Request failed: " + textStatus);
             $('#sub_newsletter div#nl_receipt').show();
             $('#sub_newsletter #nl_form').slideDown(500);
             $('#sub_newsletter').css('cursor','auto');
           }
       });
     }
   });
 });
          </script>

   var fbjs = ''
   var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
   if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
   js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
   js.src = '//connect.facebook.net/de_CH/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.3';
   fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
 }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

    <script language="javascript">
     $(document).ready(function(){
     $.getJSON( "/ajax/my_resorts" )
       .done(function( json ) {
         if (json.data && json.data.length > 0) {
           OTS.ResortCompare.create_myresort_footer(json.data.length);
           var i = 0;
           json.data.forEach(function(resort) {
             if (resort.links) {
               var resortPhoto = '';
               if (resort.resortPhoto) {
                 resortPhoto = '<img src="' + resort.resortPhoto.mid + '">'
               }
               $('#mrf_slider').append('' +
                 '<div class="mrf_slider_item" id="mrf_resort_' + resort.resort_id + '">' +
                   '<a href="' + resort.links.profile + '">' +
                     resortPhoto +
                   '</a>' +
                   '<p><a href="' + resort.links.profile + '">' + (resort.resort_name_tr || resort.resort_name) + '</a></p>' +
                   '<div class="mrf_slider_item_remove" data-resortid="' + resort.resort_id + '" rel="' + i + '"></div>' +
                 '</div>' +
               '');
               i++;
             }
           });
           OTS.ResortCompare.init_mrf_slider();
         }
       })
       .fail(function( jqxhr, textStatus, error ) {
         var err = textStatus + ", " + error;
         console.log( "Request Failed: " + err );
     });
   });
    </script>
    <script language="javascript">
     $(function() {
     $("img.lazy").lazyload({
       event : "sporty",
       threshold : 400
     });
   });
 
   $(window).bind("load", function() {
       var timeout = setTimeout(function() { $("img.lazy").trigger("sporty") }, 3000);
   });
 
   $(window).load(function(){
     OTS.dfp.makeAds();
     OTS.Search.init();
     // add onSeek handler for every scroller on the page.
     $(".scrollable, .weather_data_scroll").each( function() {
       var api = $(this).data("scrollable");
       if( api == null) return;
       api.firstScroll = true;
       api.onSeek( function() {
         if(! this.firstScroll ) OTS.dfp.reload();
         this.firstScroll = false;
       });
     });
   });
   FlashHeed.heed();
 
   OTS.TagM = OTS.TagM || {};
   OTS.Strings = OTS.Strings || {};
   OTS.Strings.Search = {
     defaultText: "Suche Skigebiet, Standort, oder Thema",
     nameFinder: "Welches Skigebiet suchst Du?"
   };
   OTS.zipperOptions = {
     enter : "Postleitzahl eingeben:",
     save : "Speichern",
     notfound : "Keine Ergebnisse gefunden."
   };
   OTS.favoritesTxtObj = {
     t1 : "Zu Favoriten hinzufügen",
     t2 : "Remove"
   };
   OTS.flagOptions = {
     reportas : "Element melden als",
     choose : "Bitte auswählen",
     additional : "Weitere Kommentare?",
     comments : "Kommentare",
     report : "Bericht",
     flag : [
       "Obszöner/vulgärer Ausdruck",
       "Hassparolen",
       "Persönlicher Angriff",
       "Werbung/Spam",
       "Urheberrechtsverletzung/Plagiat",
       "Sonstiges"
     ]
   };
   OTS.OnOff = {
       on  : "An",
       off : "Aus"
   };
 
   OTS.doXEData = function() {
 		var c = OTS.getCookie('XESTUFF');
 		if (!c || c == '') return;
 		var aff = OTS.getQuery('XE_AFF', c, ':');
 		var lnk = OTS.getQuery('XE_LNK', c, ':');
 		OTS.gaTrkEvt('Affiliate', 'XE', aff + ' + ' + lnk + ' + ' + location.href);
 		OTS.setCookie('XESTUFF', '');
 	};
 	OTS.doXEData();
 
   $( window ).load( function() {
     $.getScript( "https://www.statcounter.com/counter/counter.js" );
   });
    </script>
    <script>
     //The compare stuff - move where ever you like TK.
 //https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/cookie/Simple_document.cookie_framework
 var docCookies = {
   getItem: function (sKey) {
     if (!sKey) { return null; }
     return decodeURIComponent(document.cookie.replace(new RegExp("(?:(?:^|.*;)\\s*" + encodeURIComponent(sKey).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "\\s*\\=\\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$"), "$1")) || null;
   },
   setItem: function (sKey, sValue, vEnd, sPath, sDomain, bSecure) {
     if (!sKey || /^(?:expires|max\-age|path|domain|secure)$/i.test(sKey)) { return false; }
     var sExpires = "";
     if (vEnd) {
       switch (vEnd.constructor) {
         case Number:
           sExpires = vEnd === Infinity ? "; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT" : "; max-age=" + vEnd;
           /*
           Note: Despite officially defined in RFC 6265, the use of `max-age` is not compatible with any
           version of Internet Explorer, Edge and some mobile browsers. Therefore passing a number to
           the end parameter might not work as expected. A possible solution might be to convert the the
           relative time to an absolute time. For instance, replacing the previous line with:
           */
           /*
           sExpires = vEnd === Infinity ? "; expires=Fri, 31 Dec 9999 23:59:59 GMT" : "; expires=" + (new Date(vEnd * 1e3 + Date.now())).toUTCString();
           */
           break;
         case String:
           sExpires = "; expires=" + vEnd;
           break;
         case Date:
           sExpires = "; expires=" + vEnd.toUTCString();
           break;
       }
     }
     document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(sKey) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(sValue) + sExpires + (sDomain ? "; domain=" + sDomain : "") + (sPath ? "; path=" + sPath : "") + (bSecure ? "; secure" : "");
     return true;
   },
   removeItem: function (sKey, sPath, sDomain) {
     if (!this.hasItem(sKey)) { return false; }
     document.cookie = encodeURIComponent(sKey) + "=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT" + (sDomain ? "; domain=" + sDomain : "") + (sPath ? "; path=" + sPath : "");
     return true;
   },
   hasItem: function (sKey) {
     if (!sKey || /^(?:expires|max\-age|path|domain|secure)$/i.test(sKey)) { return false; }
     return (new RegExp("(?:^|;\\s*)" + encodeURIComponent(sKey).replace(/[\-\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "\\s*\\=")).test(document.cookie);
   },
   keys: function () {
     var aKeys = document.cookie.replace(/((?:^|\s*;)[^\=]+)(?=;|$)|^\s*|\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?(?:\1|$)/g, "").split(/\s*(?:\=[^;]*)?;\s*/);
     for (var nLen = aKeys.length, nIdx = 0; nIdx < nLen; nIdx++) { aKeys[nIdx] = decodeURIComponent(aKeys[nIdx]); }
     return aKeys;
   }
 };
 
 
 if(!OTS){
   var OTS = {};
 }
 
 function _addToCookieList(cookieName,id, maxsize) {
   var _c = docCookies.getItem(cookieName);
   id = parseInt(id);
   if (_c) {
     var _ids = [];
     _c.split('&').forEach(function(v){
       var v0 = v ? parseInt(v) : 0;
       if(v0){
         if(_ids.indexOf(v0) < 0){
           _ids.push(v0);
         }
       }
     });
     var _inar = $.inArray(id,_ids);
     if(_inar < 0){
       if(maxsize && _ids.length >= maxsize){
         for(var i = 0; i <= _ids.length-maxsize; i++){
           _ids.pop();
         }
       }
       _ids.unshift(id);
       docCookies.setItem(cookieName,_ids.join('&'), 31536e3, '/');
     }
   } else {
     docCookies.setItem(cookieName, id, 31536e3, '/');
   }
 }
 
 OTS.ResortVisited = {
   addToList: function(resId){
     _addToCookieList('actresort',resId, 30);
   }
 };
 
 OTS.Nearby = {
   _getUsrPos: function(callback, error) {
     if (navigator.geolocation) {
       navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(callback, function(e) {
         console.error(e)
       }, {
         timeout: 10000,
         maximumAge: 900000
       });
     } else {
       callback();
     }
   },
 
   getResortsData: function(callback) {
     this._getUsrPos(function(position) {
     console.log('called 189', position);
 
 
       if (position && typeof position == 'object' ) {//&& position.hasOwnProperty('coords')) {
       console.log('called 193', position);
         var _lat = position.coords.latitude;
         var _lon = position.coords.longitude;
 
         console.log('point','(' + _lon + ', ' + _lat + ')');
         console.log('_lon is', typeof _lon == 'number');
         console.log('_lat is', typeof _lat == 'number');
         if(typeof _lat == 'number' && typeof _lon == 'number'){
           $.ajax({
               url: '/ajax/my/nearby_resorts',
               dataType: 'json',
               data: {
                 lat: _lat,
                 lon: _lon,
               }
             })
             .done(callback);
         }
       }else{
         callback([]);
       }
     })
   }
 };
 
 OTS.ResortCompare = {
   toggleCompare: function(resId){
     if( $('#compare' + resId).hasClass('selected')){
       OTS.ResortCompare.removeFromCompare(resId);
     }else{
       OTS.ResortCompare.addToCompare(resId);
     }
   },
   removeFromCompare: function(resId, callback) {
     var _c = docCookies.getItem('rescompare');
 
     if (_c ) {
       var _resLAr = _c.split('&');
       var _inar = $.inArray(resId+'',_resLAr);
       if(_inar >= 0){
         _resLAr.splice(_inar,1);
         docCookies.setItem('rescompare',_resLAr.join('&'), 31536e3, '/');
       }
       OTS.ResortCompare.remove_mrf_item(resId);
       if(callback && typeof callback == 'function'){
         callback(resId);
       }
     }
     OTS.ResortCompare.set_resort_add_btn(resId, false);
   },
   addToCompare: function (resId, callback) {
     var _c = docCookies.getItem('rescompare');
 
     if (_c) {
       var _resLAr = _c.split('&');
       if (_resLAr.length > 9) {
         alert("Bitte maximal zehn Skigebiete auswählen");
         return;
       }
       var _inar = $.inArray(resId+'',_resLAr);
       if(_inar < 0){
         _resLAr.unshift(resId);
         docCookies.setItem('rescompare',_resLAr.join('&'), 31536e3, '/');
       }
     } else {
       docCookies.setItem('rescompare', resId, 31536e3, '/');
     }
     $.getJSON( "/ajax/get_simple_resort", {id: resId} )
       .done(function(data) {
          if (data.data && data.data.length > 0) {
            var resort = data.data[0];
            OTS.ResortCompare.add_mrf_item(resort);
          }
        });
     OTS.ResortCompare.set_resort_add_btn(resId, true);
     if(callback && typeof callback == 'function'){
         callback(resId);
     }
   },
   getResortIds: function () {
     var _c = docCookies.getItem('rescompare');
     if (_c ) {
       var _resLAr = _c.split('&');
       if(_resLAr.length > 0){
         return _resLAr;
       }
     }
     return [];
   },
   isCompared: function (resId) {
     var _c = docCookies.getItem('rescompare');
     if (_c) {
       var _resLAr = _c.split('&');
       var _inar = $.inArray(resId+'',_resLAr);
       if(_inar > -1){
         return true;
       }
     }
     return false;
   },
   getData: function (resIds,dt,dr,callback) {
     $.ajax({
       url: '/ajax/compare_historical',
       dataType: 'json',
       data: {
         dt: dt,
         dr: dr,
         r: resIds
       }
     })
     .done(callback);
   },
   initialize_mrf_remove: function () {
     $('.mrf_slider_item_remove').off('click');
     $('.mrf_slider_item_remove').click(function() {
       var i = $( this ).attr('rel');
       var mrf_Slider = $("#mrf_slider").data('royalSlider');
       if ( mrf_Slider ) {
         var resId = $( this ).attr('data-resortid');
         mrf_Slider.removeSlide( i );
         OTS.ResortCompare.removeFromCompare(resId);
         $('#mrf_slider .rsContainer .rsSlide').each(function( index ) {
           var myId = $( this ).children(":first").attr('id');
           $( '#' + myId + ' .mrf_slider_item_remove').attr('rel', index);
         });
         $('#mrf_numSelected').html(mrf_Slider.numSlides);
         if (mrf_Slider.numSlides < 1) {
           mrf_Slider.destroy();
           $('.my_resorts_footer').html('').css('display','none');
         }
         OTS.ResortCompare.set_resort_add_btn(resId, false);
       }
       return false;
     });
   },
   add_mrf_item: function (resort) {
     if (resort.links) {
       var resortPhoto = '';
       if (resort.resortPhoto) {
         resortPhoto = '<img src="' + resort.resortPhoto.mid + '">'
       }
       var mrf_Slider = $("#mrf_slider").data('royalSlider') || {};
       var newslide = '' +
         '<div class="mrf_slider_item" id="mrf_resort_' + resort.resort_id + '">' +
           '<a href="' + resort.links.profile + '">' +
             resortPhoto +
           '</a>' +
           '<p><a href="' + resort.links.profile + '">' + resort.resort_name_tr + '</a></p>' +
           '<div class="mrf_slider_item_remove" data-resortid="' + resort.resort_id + '" rel="' + (mrf_Slider.numSlides || 1) + '"></div>' +
         '</div>' +
       '';
       if (!mrf_Slider.numSlides) {
         OTS.ResortCompare.create_myresort_footer(1);
         $('#mrf_slider').append(newslide);
         OTS.ResortCompare.init_mrf_slider();
       }
       else {
         mrf_Slider.appendSlide(newslide);
         OTS.ResortCompare.initialize_mrf_remove();
         $('#mrf_numSelected').html(mrf_Slider.numSlides);
       }
     }
   },
   remove_mrf_item: function (resort_id) {
     var mrf_Slider = $("#mrf_slider").data('royalSlider');
     var removeSlide = -1;
     if (mrf_Slider) {
       mrf_Slider.slides.forEach(function(slide) {
         var myid = slide.content[0].id.replace('mrf_resort_','');
         if (myid == resort_id) {
           removeSlide = slide.id;
         }
       });
       if (removeSlide > -1){
         mrf_Slider.removeSlide( removeSlide );
         if (mrf_Slider.numSlides < 1) {
           mrf_Slider.destroy();
           $('.my_resorts_footer').html('').css('display','none');
         }
         else {
           $('#mrf_numSelected').html(mrf_Slider.numSlides);
         }
       }
     }
   },
   set_resort_add_btn: function (resort_id, add) {
     if (add) {
       $('#compare'+resort_id).addClass('selected').removeClass('unselected');
     } else {
       $('#compare'+resort_id).addClass('unselected').removeClass('selected');
     }
   },
   create_myresort_footer: function (num_resorts) {
     $("#socialBar").append('' +
       '<div class="my_resorts_footer">' +
         '<div class="mrf_head"><p>Meine ausgewählten Skigebiete (<span id="mrf_numSelected">' + num_resorts + '</span>)</p></div>' +
         '<div class="mrf_content">' +
           '<div class="mrf_slider_outer1"><div class="mrf_slider_outer2"><div id="mrf_slider"></div></div></div>' +
           '<a href="/myresorts/compare" class="btn_default">Jetzt vergleichen!</a><div class="clear"></div>' +
         '</div>' +
       '</div>' +
     '');
   },
   init_mrf_slider: function () {
     $('#mrf_slider').royalSlider({
       addActiveClass: true,
       arrowsNav: true,
       arrowsNavAutoHide: false,
       controlsInside: false,
       controlNavigation: 'none',
       autoHeight: true,
       loop: false,
       fadeinLoadedSlide: false,
       globalCaption: true,
       keyboardNavEnabled: true,
       globalCaptionInside: false,
       navigateByClick: false,
       slidesSpacing: 0,
       numImagesToPreload: 6,
     });
     var mrfSlider = $("#mrf_slider").data('royalSlider');
     setTimeout(function(){
       mrfSlider.updateSliderSize(true);
     }, 3000);
     mrfSlider.ev.on('rsSlideClick', function(e, slideObject) {
       OTS.ResortCompare.initialize_mrf_remove();
     });
 
     OTS.ResortCompare.initialize_mrf_remove();
 
     $('.mrf_head').click(function() {
       $( ".my_resorts_footer" ).toggleClass( "mrf_open", 5000, "easeOutSine" );
     });
   }
 };
    </script>
